programme.title: The August Coup, 1991
programme.short_synopsis: Gennady Yanayev and the Gang of Eight grab for power in the 1991 coup against Gorbachev.
programme.medium_synopsis: Gennady Yanayev and the Gang of Eight grab for power in the 1991 August coup against Gorbachev. Cooke explores how the popularity of Boris Yeltsin inevitably caused their downfall.
